backend/main.mo: Defines authorization mixin, core data types for programs, KPIs, teams, and comparison utilities for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature fixes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing UI behavior, features, and workflows.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Handles authentication flow, profile setup gating, and rendering of the main dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Computes program/KPI metrics and renders charts and metric cards with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable delete confirmation dialog built on alert-dialog components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the app header with logo, theme toggle, user profile display, and logout logic using identity hooks.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Form dialog for creating or editing a KPI, handling fields, validation, and submission to backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays and filters KPI records with search, status, period, and team filters, and supports editing and deleting KPIs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and role, then saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Renders a legend showing color labels for program, agenda, and KPI calendar categories.
Utilities for category colors and counting programs, agendas, and KPIs per day.
Error boundary component that displays a fallback UI and reset button when calendar rendering fails.
Clickable calendar grid cell showing date styling, current-month state, and colored category bars based on counts.
Side sheet showing detailed list of programs occurring on a selected date, with sorting and program click handling.
Toggle control for switching between comfortable and compact calendar grid density.
Button group for selecting calendar view mode (month, week, day, agenda).
Right-side drawer showing full program details with status, priority, timeline, and optional edit button.
Functions to filter program lists by multiple fields and count programs active on a specific date.
Provides label and style mappings for program status and priority values.
Builds a 14‑day agenda list grouping programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines by day and rendering them with badges and click actions.
Filters and displays all programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines for a single day with interactive program cards.
Generates a full monthly calendar grid and passes per‑day item counts to DayCell components for visualization.
Renders a week‑long grid view and displays category counts for each day using DayCell components.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Main program calendar UI managing views, filters, reminders, date ranges, and program/KPI/agenda data loading.
Error boundary for the program calendar that displays a fallback UI and resets related queries when retried.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Dialog form for creating or editing a program, managing form state, validation, and submit actions using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Displays a program in a card with badges, metadata, and edit/delete actions, opening detail view on card click.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Programs page with search, filtering, sorting, CRUD actions, and detail drawer integration.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: Combobox component for selecting a related program with searchable popover UI.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Reports page that filters programs and KPIs and exports report data to CSV.
frontend/src/components/team/ManagerSele: Provides a dropdown to select a manager from team members, excluding the current member.
frontend/src/components/team/PhotoUrlPre: Shows a live preview of an avatar image from a URL with load/error status indicators.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamFunctio: Renders a selectable team member tile with avatar, initials fallback, and role information.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberC: Card component showing a team member with avatar upload support, edit/delete actions, and immediate cache updates after photo changes.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberD: Side panel displaying detailed team member info including manager, division, and direct reports.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamStructu: Recursive node component rendering a team member within a hierarchical org chart, including avatar validation and child connectors.
Builds and displays the organizational structure with hierarchy warnings and selectable member details.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing team members, including image upload and manager selection.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Team management page supporting filtering, editing, deleting, and viewing members in cards or structure view.
Admin-only user management UI that lists profiles and allows role changes with loading and permission states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and maintaining an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
Hook that periodically checks upcoming program, agenda, and KPI deadlines and shows deduplicated time‑based reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication including login, status tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Custom hook that returns whether a given CSS media query currently matches using matchMedia with event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin data, programs, KPIs, and related backend resources through an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, utility classes, and animations for the application UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tab navigation, showing various management views and admin-only sections based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen with Internet Identity authentication and loading state handling.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Implements image upload via ImgBB with an Imgur fallback, including validation, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Manages reminder deduplication via localStorage, generating keys and tracking timestamps with automatic expiry cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/safeBrowserStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers around localStorage for JSON and string access with error handling and fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/teamFunctionalStructu: Collects hierarchy members, groups them by normalized division, and offers non-mutating name sorting.
frontend/src/utils/teamHierarchy.ts: Builds a team hierarchy tree with cycle and missing-manager detection, producing roots, orphans, and warnings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL params (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored values.
frontend/src/utils/urlValidation.ts: Validates whether a string is an HTTP/HTTPS URL, with a stricter check for HTTPS-only.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, calendar UI requirements, known issues, and feature metadata.
